column5: I did some fishin' for trout this morning,  haven't done any float-fishing for years, but after seeing some of the pics here last week I got the itch! I was joined by Charlied...He was a real pleasure to spend the morning with, Charlie was even kind enough to supply some roe!      Charlie landed at least 9 fish and lost a few...      I managed to land 4, lost 2 or 3...
Very nice guys!  Those sure are some beauty colours/details on those chubby trout.  Corn Nug
sweet browns dude, gotta track down some of them
Great looking fish. I think they have to best one of the best looking fish out there.
Those trout have very nice markings...
Would that be south of the boarder?
Nice browns. W2G. R they frsh or r they droping back? MAn theygot some nice color.    jordan
Great stuff guys. The scenery is as pretty as the fish!
thanks for the report & pics,you guys did real well....cheers
Lovely picture, lovely browns and excellent report I've never tried river fishing before, it makes me so want to try it now ><

Well Dax it was my pleasure joining you and would do it again anytime.....thanks for the conversation and picture taking.    I tend to wander sometimes and apologize for not being there to take a picture of most of your fish.  Until next time!
Nice report, you'd think it was spring already, instead of early January, from some of the riverside scenes!  Mike

DANG, those are nice fish! Congrats! I have caught almost everything that swims in freshwater but never a brown. I need to get together with someone who can put me on a brown trout.  Beautiful pics, thanks loads for the thread/posts.

ya they can get spooked...but when the water visibility is about 8-10 inches there is no worries on that matter...LOL  Almost all our fish were browns except the first fish I caught was a small steelie but Dax was busy and couldn't take a pic....it had beautiful colours!

It's great to see others pull fish out of the creeks.  I started creek fishing a few weeks ago...been out 4 times and have been skunked!  I had a fish on today and it gave a great fight....only for me to lose it.  Reports like this keep me motivated to try again!
Sweet browns, Most of them lucky pretty fresh. Wtg dude
A RIVER FULL OF BROWNS!!! SWEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEET!!! I'D BE KEEPIN THAT ONE ON THE DOWN LOW  LOL BEAUTY PICS AND FISH BRO!!
